item.description:
IMPORTANT UPDATE.......PLEASE READ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!



The PARTY just got BETTER!!! I have just confirmed that TROY BROWN & BAND will be playing at the picnic!!! That's right folks, Troy is doing us the honor of bringing his band to my house for your listening and dancing pleasure. WOOO HOOO!

Anyone who has heard Troy knows what a fantastic showman he is.He will have you off your feet and dancing, that is a promise! He regularly plays in Hartford, CT and Massachusetts, as well as the surrounding area....and he is fabulous! His stylings are rhythym and blues flavored jazz...a little Motown...alot of funk! Oh, yeah!!!

I am so excited about this bit of news, I just couldn't wait to share! So, be sure to join us for the best night of the summer...and get your groove on BABY!!!

There will be a $3.00 (pp) charge for this event, payable at the meetup.

Read on for picnic details...


We are winding down the summer season with a bash at Terri's house. Why let summer slip away without one more super party? Let's get together and celebrate summer!!!

This is a BYOB event...we are also asking you to bring a dish ...appetizer, entree or dessert. No grilling meats unless you can provide a grill as well. I will be coordinating the food so we will have a variety. You will be asked what you will contribute when you RSVP.

We are asking guests to bring beach chairs, coolers, ICE, and any games you may want to play (badminton, horseshoes, bocce balls, cards, board games, etc.)

The day's itinerary will go something like this... 3 pm-5pm for activities...5 pm -7 pm chow time...7-whenever- fire pit and whatever!!! We will have music all day for your listening and dancing pleasure...so bring your favorite tunes! If you drink too much, be prepared to stay over...lol!

I have a large driveway, but please do not park in the middle...leave room for others. Also road parking is available. If you park at a nearby commuter parking lot ( there is one right off I 84) and car pool it would be best. However, we will make do...

So come join us at Terri's place for good times...good food ...good company! If you need to contact me, my cell is 203-808-5829. More to follow...

RAIN DATE WILL BE THE NEXT DAY...AUGUST 22 STARTING AT 2 PM. PLEASE NOTE...THIS IS A MULTI GROUP MEETUP!
item.how_to_find_us: White house with red brick front ...look for the red balloons on the mailbox,

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Lingering Summer Party/Picnic @ Terri's House!
